TextView.android:text:
I Semester

				Advanced Corporate Accounting and Accounting Standards 
				Financial Management 
				Organizational Behaviour 
				Managerial Economics 
				Elective-I 
				Soft Skill-I


II Semester

				Advanced Cost and Management Accounting Quantitative Techniques for Business Decision Marketing of Services 
				Elective-II 
				Extradisciplinary-Total Quality Management 
				Soft Skill-II 
				List of Electives 
				1.Income Tax Law and Practice 
				2.Computerized accounting 
				3.Strategic Human Resource Management and Development 
				4.Industrial relations and labour welfare 
				5.Advertising and Salesmanship
